title: Sri Lankans form human chain to show unity against failed Government
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Protestors today formed a human chain from “NoDealGama” extending to “GotaGoGama”, calling for the resignation of the President and his Government.
Many joined the human chain, including members of the disabled community and religious members.
The protests at “GotaGoGama” opposite the President’s Office also entered its 71st day today (18).
Sri Lankans form human chain to show unity against failed Government
Family of four take turns to have a meal, as economic crisis takes it toll
